Title: Wreck-It Ralph
Plot: Wreck-It Ralph longs to be as beloved as his game's perfect Good Guy, Fix-It Felix. Problem is, nobody loves a Bad Guy. But they do love heroes... so when a modern, first-person shooter game arrives featuring tough-as-nails Sergeant Calhoun, Ralph sees it as his ticket to heroism and happiness. He sneaks into the game with a simple plan -- win a medal -- but soon wrecks everything, and accidentally unleashes a deadly enemy that threatens every game in the arcade. Ralph's only hope? Vanellope von Schweetz, a young troublemaking "glitch" from a candy-coated cart racing game who might just be the one to teach Ralph what it means to be a Good Guy. But will he realize he is good enough to become a hero before it's "Game Over" for the entire arcade?
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 33 wins & 41 nominations.
Writers: Rich Moore, Phil Johnston, Jim Reardon, Jennifer Lee
Stars: John C. Reilly, Jack McBrayer, Jane Lynch, Sarah Silverman
Companies: Walt Disney Animation Studios, Walt Disney Pictures
Tagline: When the arcade closes, the fun begins

Similars.Title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
Similars.Plot: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.
Similars.Stars: John C. Reilly, Sarah Silverman, Gal Gadot

Similars.Title: Big Hero 6
Similars.Plot: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.
Similars.Stars: Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit, Jamie Chung

Similars.Title: Monsters University
Similars.Plot: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.
Similars.Stars: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Steve Buscemi

Similars.Title: Despicable Me
Similars.Plot: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.
Similars.Stars: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand

Similars.Title: Zootopia
Similars.Plot: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.
Similars.Directors: Directors: Byron Howard, Rich Moore, and 1 more credit »
Similars.Stars: Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba

Similars.Title: Tangled
Similars.Plot: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.
Similars.Stars: Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy

Similars.Title: Frozen
Similars.Plot: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.
Similars.Stars: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Jonathan Groff

Similars.Title: Brave
Similars.Plot: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida (Kelly Macdonald) defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.
Similars.Directors: Directors: Mark Andrews, Brenda Chapman, and 1 more credit »
Similars.Stars: Kelly Macdonald, Billy Connolly, Emma Thompson

Similars.Title: The Incredibles
Similars.Plot: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.
Similars.Stars: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter

Similars.Title: Moana
Similars.Plot: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.
Similars.Directors: Directors: Ron Clements, John Musker, and 2 more credits »
Similars.Stars: Auli'i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson, Rachel House

Similars.Title: Incredibles 2
Similars.Plot: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.
Similars.Stars: Craig T. Nelson, Holly Hunter, Sarah Vowell

Similars.Title: Ratatouille
Similars.Plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.
Similars.Stars: Brad Garrett, Lou Romano, Patton Oswalt
